attributes.action: Increase the basic state pension by 100%, do not wait until 2012 to do something about it, a lot of us will be dead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You have had years to do something about the national disgrace of the basic state pension. We want an increase, now, of 100% on the basic state pensions, with no strings attached. A lot of us won't be here in 2012, act now, pretty please!!!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Increase the basic state pension by 100%, do not wait until 2012 to do something about it, a lot of us will be dead."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14689.asp

Prime Minister's Office
